p: First, 90 mL of deionized water including 0.33 g of zinc nitrite hexahydrate was slowly added to another prepared solution of 90 mL of deionized water including 0.985 g of 2-methylimidazole, then stirred continuously for 24 h at 25 °C. This mixture was centrifuged with ethyl alcohol absolute several times and dried at 70 °C in ambient air, the finally obtained white powder denoted as NPM.
